name: Farg (MBoffin, Marlowe Dobbe, icynotes)
description:
FARG! The game where you jump past the cars to get to the other side of the road! !!!AWESOME!!! *toot*

Controls:Arrows / Joystick: Move Farg! / Select Difficulty
Spacebar / Joystick Buttons: Start Game / Respawn

Art - Marlowe Dobbe (@marlowedobbe)
Code - Dylan Bennett (@mboffin)
Music/SFX - Brendan McCracken (@icynotesdx)
Concept - Sleeping Will Lewis (@gamewillpdx), as interpreted by Marlowe, Dylan and Brendan
